description: Update a material transaction ticket generator.
permissions: Admins can update ticket generators. For Broker organizations, the user must be a broker member with practical manager access to that broker. For MaterialSupplier organizations, the user must be a manager member of the supplier or a member of the associated broker.
side_effects: Updates fields on a material transaction ticket generator record.
validation_notes: At least one updatable attribute must be provided. format_rule must be present if provided.
